channel.title: What is the best RSC Base?
channel.description: im new to rsc and i need a good rsc base ;D i know you guys will say search bar noob! but there many rsc base and i would like to know wich is the better

item.title: What is the best RSC Base?
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.source: What is the best RSC Base?

item.title: What is the best RSC Base?
item.dc:creator: @bobopobo bobopobo
item.description:
@bobopobo wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:7, topic:413381”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=514884.msg3739193#msg3739193 date=1315219339]

im new to rsc and i need a good rsc base ;D i know you guys will say search bar noob! but there many rsc base and i would like to know wich is the better

EasyRSC for newbs, RSCD v25 for semi-newbs, and RSCA for total noobs.
Choose wisely.
[/quote]
oh wow then **** up the rsc server =S im too bad…idk whats sql lol
Lmao! so true…[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best RSC Base?

item.title: What is the best RSC Base?
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

RSCA is pretty much on the same difficulty level as just RSCD. You still have to set up apache and mysql and have a little knowledge for PHP and SQL.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best RSC Base?

item.title: What is the best RSC Base?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I kinda lied, felt bad for lieing

EasyRSC for total noobs, has bugs around. RSCA is upgraded version of RSCD v.25.
EasyRSC doesn’t require SQL and is the most user friendly.
RSCAngel and RSCD v25 is pretty hard to set up if you don’t have any knowledge.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best RSC Base?

item.title: What is the best RSC Base?
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

EasyRSC is RSCD without SQL. RSCA is the best out there atm but a bit messy.

Read full topic
